text: Resume your journey and go to the hill country of the Amorites; go to all the neighboring peoples in the Arabah, in the hill country, in the foothills,1:7 Hebrew Shephelah or lowlands; that is, the western foothills of Judea in the Negev, and along the seacoast to the land of the Canaanites and to Lebanon, as far as the great River Euphrates.
